task.question: Where did Deborah lure Sisera’s army to (Judg 4:7)?
What did Sisera do when he heard that Barak had gathered an army (Judg 4:12-13)?

choices.choice: Gathered his army to Kishon River
Gathered his army to Mt. Tabor
Gathered his army to the Jordan River

task.answer: Gathered his army to Kishon River

task.question: What did the Levite do with the various cut up parts of his concubine (Judg 19:29)?

choices.choice: Buried them in Shiloh in Ephraim
Burned them and scattered them in the Jordan River
Sent them back to her father

task.question: Where did David go to fight the Arameans after gathering all Israel and crossing the Jordan River (2 Sam 10:17)?
What plan seemed good to Absalom from Ahithophel for going after David (2 Sam17:1f)?

choices.choice: Choosing 12,000 men and setting out after David tonight
Rallying all Israel and then attacking David
Setting an ambush for David when he tried to cross the Jordan River
Sending messengers of Jabesh Gilead to get help from east of the Jordan

task.answer: Choosing 12,000 men and setting out after David tonight

task.question: What did Jonathan and Ahimaaz tell David to do as Absalom prepared to pursue him (2 Sam 17:21)?

choices.choice: Stay by the Valley of Jabbok
Go to Gilgal where Zadok would send news of Absalom’s plans

task.question: Where as David when Absalom crossed the Jordan River (2 Sam 17:24)?
Where did the men of Judah come to help David across the Jordan River (2 Sam19:15)?
What two fellows associated with Saul and the Benjamites rushed down to meet David as he crossed the Jordan River after defeating Absalom (2 Sam 19:16)?
Who begged David’s forgiveness at the crossing of the Jordan River after Absalom was defeated (2 Sam 19:20)?
